days.title: Trade Routes - How Goods and Ideas Traveled
days.learning_objective: Understand economic networks and cultural exchange while analyzing how global trade affects local communities and international relations.

days.title: Ecosystems - How Living Things Interact
days.learning_objective: Model ecological relationships while developing systems thinking applicable to economic, social, and technological networks.

days.title: Drawing and Sketching - Capturing the World on Paper
days.learning_objective: Practice visual communication skills while understanding how artistic expression enables cultural exchange and social commentary.

days.title: Sound Waves - The Invisible Vibrations That Connect Us
days.learning_objective: Explore wave physics while understanding how acoustic principles enable communication technology and artistic expression.

days.title: Agricultural Technology - Growing Food Efficiently
days.learning_objective: Understand agricultural innovation while exploring sustainability, food security, and the relationship between technology and environmental stewardship.

days.title: Heat Transfer - How Warmth Moves From Place to Place
days.learning_objective: Model thermal processes while understanding how energy systems affect climate, technology design, and sustainable development.

days.title: Sociology - How Societies Function
days.learning_objective: Understand social structures and institutions while building analytical skills for civic engagement and social change.

days.title: Probability - The Mathematics of Chance
days.learning_objective: Master statistical reasoning essential for evaluating risk, making informed decisions, and understanding uncertainty in scientific and policy contexts.

days.title: Symbiosis - When Species Help Each Other
days.learning_objective: Explore cooperative relationships in nature while understanding how collaboration and mutual aid create resilient communities and societies.

days.title: Painting Techniques - Color and Brush on Canvas
days.learning_objective: Practice creative expression while understanding how artistic traditions enable cultural continuity, social commentary, and cross-cultural communication.

days.title: Water Movement - How Liquids Flow and Why It Matters
days.learning_objective: Model fluid dynamics while understanding how water systems affect public health, economic development, and international cooperation.

days.title: Entertainment Technology - Digital Fun and Games
days.learning_objective: Explore digital media while understanding how entertainment technology affects social interaction, learning, and cultural expression.

days.title: Surface Tension - The Skin of Liquids
days.learning_objective: Understand molecular forces while exploring how materials science enables technological innovation and sustainable design.

days.title: Anthropology - The Study of Human Culture
days.learning_objective: Build cultural competency and research skills while understanding how anthropological knowledge informs policy, education, and international relations.

days.title: Number Theory - The Pure Mathematics of Integers
days.learning_objective: Explore mathematical foundations while understanding how pure mathematics enables cryptography, computer science, and technological security.

days.title: Soil Formation - The Living Foundation of Life
days.learning_objective: Understand geological and biological processes while exploring how soil science informs agriculture, conservation, and sustainable development.

days.title: Sculpture - Shaping Three-Dimensional Art
days.learning_objective: Practice spatial reasoning and creative problem-solving while understanding how artistic expression reflects and shapes social values.

days.title: Light Behavior - How Light Moves and Changes Around You
days.learning_objective: Explore optical physics while understanding how understanding light enables communication technology, medical imaging, and renewable energy.

days.title: Security Technology - Keeping People Safe
days.learning_objective: Understand security systems while exploring the balance between safety and privacy rights in technological surveillance systems.

days.title: Biomechanics - How Living Things Move
days.learning_objective: Explore mechanical principles in biology while understanding how biomechanics informs sports science, rehabilitation, and robotic design.

days.title: Archaeology - Uncovering Human History
days.learning_objective: Practice evidence-based reasoning and research methods while understanding how archaeological knowledge informs cultural understanding and policy.

days.title: Applied Mathematics - Math in the Real World
days.learning_objective: Connect mathematical concepts to practical applications while building quantitative literacy for technological citizenship and informed decision-making.

days.title: Fossil Formation - Preserving Ancient Life
days.learning_objective: Understand geological processes and deep time while building scientific literacy and appreciation for evidence-based reasoning about Earth's history.

days.title: Photography - Capturing Light and Moment
days.learning_objective: Practice visual communication while understanding how image technology affects journalism, documentation, and social movements.

days.title: Air Pressure - The Invisible Force Pushing All Around You
days.learning_objective: Model atmospheric physics while understanding how scientific literacy enables informed participation in climate and technology discussions.

days.title: Educational Technology - Learning in the Digital Age
days.learning_objective: Explore digital learning tools while understanding how technology affects educational equity, access, and learning effectiveness.

days.title: Globalization - The Interconnected World
days.learning_objective: Analyze global systems while understanding how economic and technological interconnection affects local communities and international relations.

days.title: Communication Studies - How Information Flows
days.learning_objective: Understand information systems while building media literacy essential for democratic participation and resistance to manipulation.

days.title: Pottery - Shaping Clay into Beauty
days.learning_objective: Practice hands-on creation while understanding how traditional crafts preserve cultural knowledge and enable creative expression.

days.title: Cave Systems - Underground Wonders
days.learning_objective: Explore geological formations while understanding how scientific exploration reveals hidden natural systems and informs environmental protection.
